rules.text: Sexually explicit or violent media must be marked as sensitive when posting. Content warn (CW) anything you wouldn't see in general media and be kind with spoilers.
No racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, xenophobia, or casteism
No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies
No harassment, spamming, dogpiling or doxxing of other users
Only share content that is legal in the United Kingdom AND your own country of origin.
Do not share intentionally false or misleading information
No ban evasion, NFT, AI Artwork, impersonation, hate or gore-centric accounts. Parody is ok if clearly labelled.
You must be 18+ to join this server. Read the House Rules & Extended Code of Conduct (https://furry.energy/about & https://furry.energy/privacypolicy)

records.text: I've never done art for pride month before, so I thought I'd give something a go this year. I decided on making a stencil, and did these few things with it. Whilst I think the canvas piece (third picture) came out fairly well, I think the two I did on a legal graffiti wall near me could have come out a little better. I'll chalk it up as a learning experience though and grow from it - using spray paint as well as making, cutting out and transporting stencils is all very new to me. If anyone is interested in hearing more about the thought process and the makings of this piece, let me know - it might be cool to write a blog post about it. For now, happy pride month, all 💙 I'll have something else to share soon of a similar nature. #art#furryart#pride#pridemonth
